q1: Does this calculator account for leap years?
a1: Yes, the calculator correctly handles leap years and varying month lengths in all calculations.
q2: Can I calculate dates in the past?
a2: Yes, in Add/Subtract mode use negative numbers to subtract time from a date. In Difference mode, the order of dates does not matter.
q3: What units are shown in the difference?
a3: The difference is shown in days, weeks, months, years, hours, and minutes simultaneously.
